section.title: Description
section.p: "Identifies the security profile supported by the service. This object is used directly in conjunction with the Electronic Service Information object" - ONC S&I Clinical Element Data Dictionary (CEDD), March 2012.

stentry.p: "A coded value that identifies, if appropriate, the security profile supported by the service." - ONC S&I Clinical Element Data Dictionary (CEDD), March 2012.
"A coded value that identifies, if appropriate, constraints supported by this SecurityProfile" - ONC S&I Clinical Element Data Dictionary (CEDD), March 2012.
"Version(s) of the security profile supported" - ONC S&I Clinical Element Data Dictionary (CEDD), March 2012.
